summary: A woman leaves an abusive husband to start a new life in Chicago, where she befriends a man undergoing an emotional crisis, who she does not know is a professional killer, and a detective, who is investigating the hit man.
cast: Michael Keaton|Kelly Macdonald|Bobby Cannavale|Kareem Bandealy|Darlene Hunt|Philip Earl Johnson|Rich Wilkie|Keith Kupferer|Tom Bastounes|Guy Van Swearingen|Larry Neumann Jr.|William Dick|Lori Ann Gerdisch|Greg Mills|Mike Bradecich|Mike Falevits|Alkesh Patel|Sean Fortunato|Manny Sosa|Julijana Lazarevich|Doug McDade|Norman K. title: Caballero y asesino
